name: BigEarRadio
0:
”Alexa, open big ear radio”
”Alexa, start big ear radio”
”Alexa, play big ear radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big ear radio
des:
You can now listen to Big Ear Radio on your Alexa-enabled smart devices.

Equal Ability Radio is a registered Charity dedicated to socially integrating and supporting the disabled and disadvantaged towards a better society. All profits are used to provide specialist equipment, medical care, respite care, education, work opportunities and better living conditions right around the world. We are the station that listens to you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
